speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: What the hell do you want? I don’t have time for your crap!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand you're busy. I’m calling about your outstanding balance with ABC Lending. First, can you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Customer
text: Why the hell should I tell you anything? Get lost!

speaker: Agent
text: I appreciate your frustration, but I need to confirm your identity. Could you please provide your address instead?

speaker: Customer
text: You think I'm gonna give you that? Screw you!

speaker: Agent
text: I completely understand your hesitation. However, without verification, I can’t discuss your account details.

speaker: Customer
text: Fine! It’s 123 Fake St. Now tell me what you want!

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that. Your outstanding balance is $500. How would you like to proceed with the payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I don't have the damn money right now!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand. Would you like to set up a payment plan or discuss other options?

speaker: Customer
text: I don’t want any of your stupid options! Just leave me alone!

speaker: Agent
text: I respect your wishes, but I will need to follow up with you in a couple of weeks if that’s alright.

speaker: Customer
text: Whatever, just do what you want!

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for your time today. Have a good day.
